Config.Name: Web UI Port
Config.Description: Container Port: 8080

Config.Name: Database Connection URL
Config.Description: Postgres database connection URL

Config.Name: App Base URL
Config.Description: Public URL of this service. If using HTTPS, cookies will be marked Secure.

Config.Name: Trusted Proxy CIDR Ranges
Config.Description: Comma-separated list of trusted proxy CIDR ranges for forwarded headers

Config.Name: Media Server
Config.Description: Type of media server to authenticate against

Config.Name: Session Secret
Config.Description: HMAC secret for JWT cookie

Config.Name: Data Key
Config.Description: Base64 32-byte key for sealing tokens at rest

Config.Name: Force Secure Cookie
Config.Description: Set to 1 to force Secure on cookies (behind TLS/ingress)

Config.Name: Authorized Page - External URL
Config.Description: External URL on authorized page

Config.Name: Authorized Page - External URL Text
Config.Description: Text for external URL on authorized page

Config.Name: Unauthorized Page Request - Email
Config.Description: Email address for unauthorized page request access link

Config.Name: Unauthorized Page Request - Email Subject
Config.Description: Subject for unauthorized page request access email

Config.Name: Plex - Owner Token
Config.Description: Token from Plex server owner; used to validate server membership.

Config.Name: Plex - Server Machine ID
Config.Description: Machine ID of your Plex server (preferred over name).

Config.Name: Plex - Server Name
Config.Description: Optional: Plex server name (used if machine ID not set).

Config.Name: Emby - Server URL
Config.Description: URL of your Emby server (e.g. http://IP:PORT).

Config.Name: Emby - Server API Key
Config.Description: API key from your Emby server.

Config.Name: Emby - App Name
Config.Description: Name of the Emby application (for client headers).

Config.Name: Emby - App Version
Config.Description: Version of the Emby application (for client headers).

Config.Name: Jellyfin - Server URL
Config.Description: URL of your Jellyfin server (e.g. http://IP:PORT).

Config.Name: Jellyfin - Server API Key
Config.Description: API key from your Jellyfin server.

Config.Name: Jellyfin - App Name
Config.Description: Name of the Jellyfin application (for client headers).

Config.Name: Jellyfin - App Version
Config.Description: Version of the Jellyfin application (for client headers).

Config.Name: Log Level
Config.Description: Logging level
